capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an even more impressive witch. I think her affiliation with the school is really admirable, given her dedication to teaching and mentoring young witches and wizards.

You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an even more impressive witch. I think that's one of the reasons why she's such a beloved figure among students - she genuinely cares about each and every one of us, and pushes us to be our best selves.

You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and a fierce protector of her students.
